                                        "Script Body": "import org.apache.nifi.processor.io.StreamCallback\nimport java.io.InputStream\nimport java.io.OutputStream\nimport org.apache.nifi.processor.AbstractProcessor;\nimport org.apache.nifi.processor.ProcessSession;\nimport org.apache.nifi.processor.ProcessContext;\nimport java.util.Set;\n\nclass PrepareErrorResponse extends AbstractProcessor {\n\t\n\t\n    def REL_SUCCESS = new Relationship.Builder().name(\"success\")\n        .description(\"FlowFiles that were successfully processed\").build()\n\t\n\t@Override\n    Set<Relationship> getRelationships() {\n        return [REL_SUCCESS] as Set\n    }\n\n\t@Override\n    public void onTrigger(ProcessContext context, ProcessSession session) {\n        def flowFile = session.get()\n        if (!flowFile) return\n\n        def attrValue = flowFile.getAttribute(\"putsql.error\")\n\n        if (attrValue && !attrValue.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            flowFile = session.write(flowFile, new StreamCallback() {\n                void process(InputStream inputStream, OutputStream outputStream) {\n                    outputStream.write(attrValue.getBytes(\"UTF-8\"))\n                }\n            })\n        }\n\n        session.transfer(flowFile, REL_SUCCESS)\n    }\n}\n\nprocessor = new PrepareErrorResponse()",

                                    },
